title: Researchers
text:
Janet van Niekerk
My research areas are Bayesian methods, Biostatistics, Spatial Statistics and Computational Statistics. Most of my work has been at the intersection between methods and computing of those methods.

title: Welcome
text: This website contains information on the research active groups and researchers within the Department of Statistics at the University of Pretoria. Use this information to apply for a project hosted by a specific researcher using the Application tab.

title: About
text:
This website is maintained by Janet van Niekerk (janet.vanNiekerk@up.ac.za)
It is used to host the Honours research projects information for the Department of Statistics at the University of Pretoria.
